EmailTemplate.description: Template used for notifying an employee that the inquiry raised on the Employee Portal has been closed by an Agent
EmailTemplate.name: Employee Portal Closed Inquiry Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your MySutter Connection Service Request Has Been Resolved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Your Service Request {!Case.CaseNumber} has been resolved and is closed. This request will no longer be monitored via MySutter Connection.
We hope this has been handled to your satisfaction. If you have additional questions regarding this issue, please call us at 916-297-8300 and we will be happy to assist you further.
Thank you,
Sutter Health
